abstract: Since the passing of the financial crisis, boutique investment banks have claimed that their time has come. Their pitch is relatively simple: we sell advice and advice alone.

lead_paragraph: For merger advisers this year, it has been good to be an independent.

headline.main: In Latest Deals, Big Roles for Boutique Investment Banks
